notes: Labour Day protests were staged in Albay province on May 1. There were reports that authorities tried to block or delay the protests.

A drug suspect was killed during a police raid in Balayan, Batangas on 2 May. His companion was arrested.

Police officers clashed with New People's Army rebels at a checkpoint in Barangay Dambo, Pangil, Laguna on 2 May. One rebel was killed while 5 others were captured. A number of firearms and equipment were recovered.
The military launched an air and ground assault on the Abu Sayyaf in Barangay Mahatalang, Sumisip, Basilan on 2 May. Nine rebels were killed and several others appear to have been wounded.

A drug suspect was shot dead in a vigilante-style attack by unidentified armed in Barangay Zone 5 of Bantay, Ilocus Sur on 2 May. He had previously surrendered to the police for being involved with drugs.
A drug suspect was killed during a police raid in San Jose del Monte, Bulacan on 3 May.

Police officers clashed with suspected New People's Army rebels at Dimasalang, Masbate on 3 May. 1 police officer was injured.
A drug suspect was shot dead in a vigilante-style attack in Quezon City, Metro Manila on 3 May. She had just been released from prison. She was previously arrested for drug charges.
3 drug suspects were killed during a police raid in Cebu City, Cebu on 3 May.
Soldiers of the 5th Industry Division had a series of encounters with around 30 New People's Army rebels in Barangay Balani, Sto. Nino, Cagayan on 3 May 2018. Around 5 soldiers were injured.
Drug suspects were killed during a police raid at Lian, Batangas on 4 May.

A village chairman seeking reelection was killed by unidentified gunmen in Mallig town area, Isabela on 9 May.

A drug suspect was killed during a police operation in Barangay Cotta, Lucena City, Quezon on May 29.
Kilusang Mayo Uno staged protests in Makati, Metro Manila on May 29. They criticized the government for rising prices of basic commodities, low wages, and labor contractualization.
Unidentified assailants threw a grenade at the house of the Mayor and Vice Mayor in Bacong town, Negros Oriental on May 29, leaving one person injured.
On May 29 and May 30, the military launched an air and ground assault on NPA rebels in Barangay Saad, Dumingag town, Zamboanga del Sur. No number of casualties were disclosed.

Weapons seizure: Soldiers from the 1st Mechanized Infantry Battalion and the 7th Field Artillery Battalion, as well as police officers, captured a BIFF weapons factory in Sharrif Aguak town area, Maguindanao on May 29.
A village councilor was killed by unidentified assailants in Barangay Gatuslao, Candoni town, Negros Occidental on May 29.
On May 29 and May 30, the military launched an air and ground assault on NPA rebels in Barangay Saad, Dumingag town, Zamboanga del Sur. No number of casualties were disclosed.
2 drug suspects were killed during a police operation in Pandi, Bulacan on May 30.
Weapons seizure: Soldiers from the 1st Mechanized Infantry Battalion and the 7th Infantry Battalion, as well as police officers, captured a BIFF weapons factory in Sultan Kudarat province on May 30.
Defusal: Soldiers from the 602nd Brigade retrieved 5 IEDs allegedly left by BIFF rebels in Barangay Kibayao, Carmen town, Cotabato on May 30.
1 drug suspect was killed during a police operation in Obando, Bulacan on May 30.
1 drug suspect was killed during a police operation in Santa Maria, Bulacan on May 30.

A drug suspect and his unidentified companion were killed during a police raid in Barangay Kristong Hari, Quezon City, Metro Manila on May 30. Another drug suspect was killed during a police raid in Barangay Santo Domingo, Quezon City, Metro Manila on the same day.
2 drug suspects were killed during a police operation in Balagtas, Bulacan on May 30.

actor2: Military Forces of the Philippines (2016-) Citizen Armed Force Geographical Unit
notes: Suspected NPA rebels killed a village councilor and militiaman, in Barangay Mahaba, Cabadbaran City, Agusan del Norte on May 30.
Drug suspects were killed during a police raid in Barangay Banay-Banay, Cabuyao City, Laguna on May 30.
A drug suspect was killed during a police operation in San Pablo, Laguna on May 30.
A drug suspect was killed during a vigilante-style attack in Barangay Bagong Silang, Caloocan City, Metro Manila on May 30.
A drug suspect was killed during a shootout with the police in Barangay Bagong Pagasa, Quezon City, Metro Manila on May 30. 1 police officer was wounded in the shootout.
2 drug suspects were killed during a police operation in Pulilan, Bulacan on May 30.

A police officer was killed by two assailants allegedly hired by village chair and drug suspect at Roxas Boulevard, Pasay City, Metro Manila on May 31. The victim was supposedly going to submit a list of drug pushers to the police.
Property destruction: Unidentified gunmen strafed the house of an election officer in San Francisco town, Cebu province on May 31. No one was home during the attack.
